name: material-scrolltop
description: Lightweight, Material Design inspired plugin for scrolling on top of the html page (with jQuery)
author: Lukas Bartak <bart@bartweb.cz> (https://github.com/bartholomej)

scripts.build: yarn delete:dist & yarn copy & yarn build:scss & yarn tsc && yarn compress
scripts.compress: yarn node-minify --compressor uglify-js --input 'dist/material-scrolltop.js' --output 'dist/material-scrolltop.min.js' && yarn node-minify --compressor cssnano --input 'dist/material-scrolltop.css' --output 'dist/material-scrolltop.min.css'
scripts.release:patch: git checkout master && npm version patch -m "chore(update): patch release %s ðŸ› "
scripts.release:minor: git checkout master && npm version minor -m "chore(update): release %s ðŸš€"
scripts.release:major: git checkout master && npm version major -m "chore(update): major release %s ðŸ’¥ "
